title: Unable to pull NCAAB rosters prior to the 2009-10 season
body:
**Describe the bug**
I'm getting an error when I try to pull NCAAB rosters prior to the 2009-10 season.

**To Reproduce**
```Python
from sportsreference.ncaab.teams import Teams

for team in Teams(year = 2009):
    roster = team.roster  # Gets each team's roster
    for player in roster.players:
        print(player.name)  # Prints each players name on the roster
```

**Expected behavior**
This should print the names of players on every NCAAB roster during the 2008-09 season.

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/60186199/86960893-3f20ec00-c12e-11ea-80d7-ae961327a5ae.png)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
I am running this code on Google Colab using sportsreference-0.5.2.

**Additional context**
If I run code to pull the roster for a pre-specified team (i.e. 'CONNECTICUT') for the 2008-09 season, I am able to do so. The problem really just arises when trying to pull the full list of NCAAB teams that season (so is likely a problem with Teams()). This may end up being a problem with the sports-reference website itself, but I just wanted to draw attention to the issue.
